imgDesc.text: Certain skills and effects can grant characters wielding Swords, Claymores, and Polearms with an <color=#ffe14b>Elemental Infusion</color> : Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will deal Elemental DMG of the corresponding element. The effects of multiple Infusions do not stack.

Additionally, some skills can convert character's attacks, making them deal Elemental DMG. Even though this effect is similar to Infusion, it <color=#ffe14b>cannot be overridden by any Elemental Infusion</color> .
